website_summaries.verdict: Great price for the size of the bottle and the infuser basket, but not always the best quality.
pros: No-slip grip on both sides of the 32-ounce bottle
Offers a full-length infusion rod for maximum space for fruits
cons: Some buyers had issues with the hinge on the lid breaking, which prevents the lid from staying closed

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE:  Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I got the lime green colored one and I love it!! The inside canister holds a lot of fruit or whatever you choose and is easily removable. I love this bottle and I take mine to the gym but I plan on buying another to keep at work! UPDATE 2/12/2018: Changing my review from 5 stars to 3. The bottle has recently started dripping from where the lid screws on. Yes, I make sure it's on correctly and tightly. When drinking I end up with water dripped all over me. Very disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Infusion Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good about this infusion bottle! First of all, the top is extremely easy for me to open. That was a big plus, as I have arthritis issues that make most bottles difficult to open. The size of the bottle is large enough for me to have plenty of water, but still comfortable to hold in my hand. The full length infusion rod holds a large amount of fruit, and helps to ensure that all of my water is nicely flavored. The hook on the side also makes it great to take along on a walk! I will definitely be buying these as gifts for my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE EBERLINE

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Good For Your Health
customer_reviews.text: I had never used anything like this before but I can honestly say I just love this water bottle using fruit an or vegetables and we have not drank any soft drinks since buying these so it is much more healthy and they taste very good as well as refreshing. Do yourself a favor and buy one and try it and I am sure that you will love it. This is a well made quality product and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Rileybowler

customer_reviews.title: Best Infuser Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Best infuser water bottle, I've owned. I typically just threw my fruit into the bottom of a large bottle and went about my day, this infuser is good sized and doesn't take up the entire bottle. I love ice cold drinks, and this works great with ice as well. Crushed ice works better, but wedge ice works too, just don't put too many in it. I've gotten many compliments on it as well. It's easy to clean and I don't need a special bottle brush to clean the inside. There aren't any extra straws or valves to clean either. Highly recommend this bottle, oh and the fact the company sends a water infuser recipe e-book, is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Pramp

customer_reviews.title: Gifts Were Appreciated
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Mother's Day gifts, and they both use them regularly. My mother wanted to replace her coffee with water but hated the taste of it plain, so we got this for her. She has two and likes this one just as well as the other. My mother-in-law likes diet drinks so I bought her this to encourage her to skip the aspertame. She also likes it and it's always in her dish drain when I visit so I'm hopeful that she's using it and skipping the artificial sweeteners!
customer_reviews.author: Kimpropriety

customer_reviews.title: Stupidest thing I've ever purchased from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: It does NOTHING! It's a water bottle, that's it, it filters nothing! For example, I like lemon and ginger in my water, i would have to pick all the seeds out of the lemon and use a huge chunk of ginger otherwise I'd be drinking it, there is nothing to filter out pieces before drinking. Amazon did ship it quick, that's the only good thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dski6

customer_reviews.title: Ehh..... it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice water bottle however, a little expensive. You’re almost better off just adding fruit to your water bottle and not spending extra money for a container that goes in the center to hold your fruit. So I definitely do not think it is worth the money. Maybe if it was made out of glass instead of plastic it would be worth it....... anyways I will say I love the fact that the lid does not fall on your face when you go to drink from it. A definite plus but otherwise I’d say save your money and buy something else. Not a terrible product, but in my opinion definitely overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Romane

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They secure so the small toddler can't get into them. They also work well for mixing my lemons in and for the infusing. I am especially happy because while we did break two of them (the tops), you will see that this seller will send you replacement parts if you send them a photo of the damage. I found that out when I was searching for a replacement lid for one that my child dropped. They sent me two lids because I showed that my second bottle was also damaged. The excellent customer service inspired me to also purchase a third bottle from them.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: To hold the bottle correctly the front clasp hits and pushes against your chin when you drink. It sits up so high on the collar and lid. So you can drink turning your wrist to drink sideways, which is an uncomfortable position for your wrist, or you turn the bottle sideways with a clear access, but you cannot use the finger grips/grooves, this manufacturer likes to advertise about. If the bottle is wet or your hands are wet the bottle slips right out of your grasp. Unfortunately, I ordered this bottle before I left for my vacation, so I did not actually get to use it before the return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Dusty

customer_reviews.title: This is a great infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great infuser bottle. I had another brand that was glass and while it was a good infuser, it unfortunately met an untimely accident and shattered. So I waited a while to get another and came across this one during Amazon Prime Day. It is really nice and easy to use. Just cut up your favorite fruit(s), add to the infuser core, fill with liquid, give it a little bit for the juice to start leeching into the water and drink. Easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: luvbnhealthy

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, product arrived in great condition. Packaging was nice. However the water bottle leeks from the lid when you lye it on its side or drink from it the wrong way. Doesn't matter how tight I screw on the lid it still leaks :( super bummed about this because otherwise this would be the perfect water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Joan1911

customer_reviews.title: My latest favorite buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful, and I especially like the recipe and tips booklet they e-mail you after you buy this! They take some of the guess work out of how you can best optimize the product! This is definitely a product that has me drinking more water since I don't want to waste the fruit I put in the infuser. I even love that there's a slight tilt in the drinking spout that makes the product easier to drink from, and the lid is stable enough to where it doesn't fall on your face when you're drinking. Solid 5 stars on all fronts!
customer_reviews.author: BCM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: I love a new water bottle! This one does not leak and is very sturdy and thick! I got the mint color which is accurate, true to the word. The fruit diffuser is very long and can fit a lot of fruit which is really nice, it also has a little infinity design on it! The middle inside top Above the diffuser is slotted with a part protruding so you can take it out so when re filling you have to be careful or take the middle part out which is fine with me! I love this bottle in all aspects! Keep the rubber part for the top hole so it stays leak proof as well.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah & Nick

customer_reviews.title: Can't do without
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty diligent when it comes to staying hydrated. I just don't like drinking water. Now that I have a fruit-infused container, I am drinking TONS more water. There's no struggle to keep drinking and it's fantastic! In addition to drinking more, I'm pretty obsessed with how cute my bottle is! Also worth mentioning is that I had a question about the recipes and the vendor was quick to respond and answer all my questions and concerns. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & gets you drinking
customer_reviews.text: I love my bottle & it is very cute too. I take it to the gym & to work. The only reason I gave it a 4/5 is because the little metal tab holder broke a week after but the bottle still remains closed without it so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Modica

customer_reviews.title: Good choice, good design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good grip, light weight, easy to assemble and disassemble, seal holds well after two months of casual use (2-3x/week). I expect to use it more frequently in the summer, and may amend my review if necessary. Lid responds correctly when I push the button, and the small wire clasp effectively locks it. Handles being jostled around in a bag well with no leakage. Only one time did it leak, and that was because I had accidentally displaced the O-ring in the lid. Once I repositioned it, the seal integrity was fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: You will love this water bottle. I have no issues with it, and absolutely love the fruit infusion. Great value as well. UPDATE: As of 12/08/2019 I’m done with this water bottle. It was great, now its just annoying. I had to get a replacement cap (which the company kindly sent for free) since the gasket broke that holds the bottle top open. It broke again a month or so later. Maybe I had bad luck with this bottle, but I don’t want to replace the cap every month.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Really like this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the previous versions. I liked it so much, I ordered a second. The orange (usually my fav color) is a little emergency pylon orange. The freezer piece is no longer offered, BUT the fruit storage is bigger. The first time I used it, there was a little leak, but I will attribute it to user error. I never had that issue with the first one. It's a great item if you are out and about and you need to sometimes put your bottle in a bag with other things.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Want to drink more water?
customer_reviews.text: I got one for me and my husband and we love them. If you put watermelon in or strawberry’s you don’t have to worry about swallowing the seeds because they can’t get through the wholes. After putting the fruit in the middle holder and filling it up with water put in refrigerator for about 20 minutes that helps the flavor release in the water. It was a little hard to clean the holder where you put the fruit but you take your time cleaning it or using tiny brushes that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water bottle at an excellent price. The lid on mine was cracked on arrival, and with a simple request, a replacement was sent out immediately. I couldn't ask for better service. I have purchased several of these water bottles for other family members and all like them and never have had an issue. If you're on the fence about ordering, by all means, get one. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose, but I would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I find the product itself to serve its purpose. However, there are many things I’m not a fan of overall and if it were not a hassle, I’d return the product. First off, the mouthpiece. When you open the lid to drink this, the top part that pops off is connected to a piece that sticks up and hits my chin every single time I take a drink. The actual infuser is connected to another piece which are both cheaply made. The bottle itself does not remain cold very long and sweats everywhere unlike most water bottles and or my prior infuser. I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this get so many compliments on it, the reason it’s for stars because if I do not put the insert correctly it will leak, it’s an easy fix but have to make sure I really pay attention to it, so that sucks for the mornings I’m running late. Also if I put cold water in it the condensation is ridiculous have to have a coaster or paper towel under it. But I drink so much more water now because of this bottle so it’s worth it to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the troubles
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks now and can write an honest review of my use/experience I’m not too happy with this water bottle. The infusion rod is very difficult to unscrew. It’s certainly an airtight seal, but very difficult to remove each time I’m putting in fruit and cleaning. Also the plastic sealing rings get little bits of mold in them and surrounding plastic cap. I keep this refrigerated so it’s not like it’s sittng out getting warm all the time. It’s gross and a hassle to remove everything and sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: wino

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY love this bottle!! I just started doing a KETO diet and am drinking 100oz. of water everyday. I fill it with fruit at night, put it in the fridge. The next day I drink that bottle, then refill it (without changing the fruit) and let it sit about an hour before drinking it. It’s delicious!! I suggest printing the recipe book because some of their combinations are really tasty!!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely drink anything but water and having a slight natural taste of fruit is a nice change. This bottle is designed very well for easy cleaning, is leak proof and the insert doesn't take away from the amount of water held. I purchased for a friend who was going through chemo and she loved it. She in turn purchased for another person going through the same thing. Will be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Helps me drink more water
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is well built and sturdy. I really like how it's designed and its very comfortable to hold and drink from. For me personally, this is a game changer - I am able to drink at least 64 oz of water a day thanks to this bottle. It's also fun to get creative and try different fruit combos to infuse with - so far there has not been a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Bar.f

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size water bottle, larger than expected. I love the pink color. It is a bit difficult to add a lot of ice and I have not noticed a strong fruit flavor when I add peaches, etc. I like that you can use it with or without the fruit insert. Plus it fits in my car cup holder which many do not. I would buy it again. The only reason I gave it four stars is because the little metal part on the lid came off and had stretched out a bit. Luckily I found it and my husband was able to fix it easily for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of using
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical about this because I haven't found a water infuser that actually works. This one is the best. Price is right, ease of cleaning and getting fruit out of the interior sleeve is easy. My hand just fits inside to clean. I don't have a dishwasher so being able to get to the bottom was important to me. I haven't had any leaks and it may be because I don't stick it in a dishwasher. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Stanford

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: this is by far one of my favorite products I've bought. I have one I ordered from the sellers website and this one. They function exactly as advertised. Every now and then, I get a few drops that leak out when I tip it to drink, but nothing significant. The only thing I was relatively bummed about is that these didn't have the time label on them like the one I had ordered from the actual website.
customer_reviews.author: Holly K

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating in Style
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bottle of this type and I really like it. The infuser is long enough to reach through the entire bottle so my lemon can infuse the entire bottle. The grips on the sides are well placed and the ability to lock the lid in place is really great because it prevents leaks when it's in my bag. -- My only note is that you need to make sure that you pushed the infuser top all the way down and thread the top on well otherwise water will flood out on your front the first time you tip it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bartholome

customer_reviews.title: I was very excited to get it and it is easy to use and keeps fruit in the center nicely
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bottle for less than 4 months. I was very excited to get it and it is easy to use and keeps fruit in the center nicely. About a month after getting it, it started to leak. I have to keep the bottle upright or it makes a mess. It still leaks 4 months later and I’d just rather not use it if I can’t garauntee that it’s not going to stay upright (in my work bag, etc). Now the lid doesn’t close properly and it somehow got a little crack in the lid. This was a complete impulse buy for me, I should have bought something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH E DERR

customer_reviews.title: Great idea liked it so much that I bought three ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea liked it so much that I bought three of them, then after a week of use the two I use daily started to leak which is a major problem! Now I can't use them and I have to buy new ones, I assure you that they will be of a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: asilversurfer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cup!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this specific cup. I have had a couple of these kinds from other stores and this one is by far the best. I love the way it’s made! Even if I decide not to put anything to diffuse in the water I leave the middle piece out and still drink from the cup. It’s hard to explain, but the opening is perfect. It’s not too small, like a straw. But big enough so that you’re getting a decent amount when you drink from it. I already purchased one for my mom. About to for my husband and father so they stop stealing ours!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a week and love it! I normally drink lots of diet coke or those fruit flavored seltzer waters. Too much plastic, too much money, and carbonation that's not very good for me. So I gave this a try. It looks attractive with cut fruit in it (5-6 friends have asked me about it), it's easy to refill, and the cold water has just a hint of fruit flavor. It's not like drinking a flavored (sugar-y) drink. But it's interesting and fresh tasting and makes it easier to drink lots of water every day. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: S.C.A.

customer_reviews.title: best one out there
customer_reviews.text: Looked over ALOT of infusion bottles. Most have bad reviews & or break in no time. This one is made with screw tops, rubber gaskets, a carry handle & a no-spill top. The chamber where the fruit goes is easy to clean but be careful not to poke at it too much as it can break. My only complaint is there is not enough room to add ice. So I compromise by adding shaved ice or freezing the bottle for an hour before taking out. Overall, this is the best bottle I have found.
customer_reviews.author: DMichaelMc

customer_reviews.title: Your water grows warm quickly that's why 4 scores instead of 5
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottle for infusing fruit. The size is great and I love the fact that I can 2 a day and drink the recommended amount of daily water. My only issue is that there is no installation and your water warms up quickly. Also if you have a iPad and no computer you will not be able to download the ebook. Please make available on the amazon app or iBooks. Also if there is some type of sleeve for installation that will work with bottle would be great. I use my bottle everyday and just the o e small improvement would make this the best infusion bottle.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Really cool bottl
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's got the infuser piece. However, I take it out to have ice in my water and that causes it not close the right way, so the designated holding areas for your thumb and fingers are flipped, making it a littel awkward but nothing terrible. It does feel like it might break when trying to open it up, but that could just be me. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Did not work consistantly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my Epson XP830. Had problems from the beginning. Using the directions I reset and persisted accordingly. They worked for a few days and then got multiple errors with every firmware update. I reset again each time. I gave 2 stars because I took the time to reset every chance and did get SOME use out of them but not worth the savings. I believe I spent more, not worth the aggravation. I replaced with real Epson and it worked seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: ToniP

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: The part that holds fruit broke the first day while trying to put the lid on it. It’s ridiculously fragile. It’s the part where they’ve put their infinity symbol. Then after one washing the other side of the symbol broke off after being washed by hand. The bottle still works but the insert lets large pieces through now. It still let little seeds through before it broke
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle you should get it lol :)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife she loves it uses it almost everyday fits nice size chucks of fruit in the bottle and the taste of the water is amazingly good. Would recommend to let the fruit sit in the bottle with water over night in the fridge for the best tase. Study bottle, sleek looking, easy open cap, perfect for use at the gym
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality, purpose, and health benefits
customer_reviews.text: I got this bottle for Mother's Day and love it. I am always carrying water with me in my car and refuse to use plastic bottles. This one appears to be safe and fits in the drink holder of my car very well. I love being able to add fruit to the bottle for an added boost of flavor and health. I keep it with fruit inside in the refrigerator so all I have to do is grab it on the way out the door. It is a little heavy, so I don't carry it in my purse, but it is perfect for the car or around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: like that it easily can be used with or without fruit infuser. An accident had one break after a fall on the tile and I liked it so much I had to get a second. The lock on the lid is something that I didn't think I would like but its very handy to have when throwing in a backpack
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: i just received this yesterday and immediately loved the color. I ordered rose pink and its just like the picture. I used it for the first time and fell in love with it. Will take with me everywhere I go. i don't like water and this infused water bottle will be just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: My first infuser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this infuser! I've always wanted one but they're all super expensive. I haven't had the money to buy a glass one but I also haven't checked to see if this one is made with safe plastic. The lid seems secure and has a little metal latch that keeps it shut if the plastic clasp breaks, which is pretty handy. It seems like it would last a long time but it seems fragile enough to break if it fell on the floor. I think its a great deal for the price and would definitely recommend this to anyone who's on the fence about buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria, 27

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: For my healthy family member, this was a great gift that allows her to change the flavor of water frequently. Has been used with ginger, strawberries, cherries and citrus most often. Seeds. do not leak into the water, just the juice. Size is good for taking to the longer workout.
customer_reviews.author: bjb

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for some good infusers and after reading the reviews decided to try these. So glad I did! I absolutely love it. Even bought a second for my husband as well. Very durable and sturdy. Though my son did forget to flip the metal latch and the button to open the lid broke, but still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Cmzman

customer_reviews.title: Easy, useful, & flavorful
customer_reviews.text: This is helping me drink more water! I have 2 of them, & I go through both in a typical day. I’ve found the fruit remains flavorful (at least enough so for me) for 2 uses. I’ve not had a leak at all, the loop hooks easily to my gym bag’s clip, & the rubber grip on one side is good for sweaty fingers. I’m working my way through the recipe book (sent as a pdf), & no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee King

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is amazing. I drink SO much more water, and its a huge bottle so great for long days. If I am feeling sick I out ginger in; bloated I will throw in some lemon and mint, etc. So many great combos to be had. Customer service is fantastic - I dropped one bottle and cracked the lid and they sent a new one free of charge. I have bought several as gifts and recommended it to a ton more. A nice feature of this particular diffuser bottle is that the inside shaft goes all thew way to the bottom, so you are getting flavor in the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but...
customer_reviews.text: I would give a 5 star rating because I do love the bottle. But it always leaks out of the cap where it screws on. Other than that it is a pretty amazing bottle. Makes making my fruit infused waters easier. Edit: Review lowered to a 3 star because the leaking is getting a little out of hand. If I don't have the fruit capsule in the middle. It is fine, but if I do then every time I go to drink out of it I get water all over my shirt and it's rather annoying. Especially when I'm at work.
customer_reviews.author: Suuyang

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review. I bought myself this cup and I love it. My daughter did too so I got her one. And I just got another one for my mom as a gift. Somehow the bottle does really well at pulling the flavor from the fruit into the water. This is my raspberry blackberry water. Cups are easy to clean. I’ve had no problems at all and I feel great because I’m drinking a lot more fruit and veggie infused water. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous water bottle. It a tastier way to drink water. You can put fruits, herbs and vegetables in the cylinder and drink healthy flavored water all day long. It is well made and doesn't leak either. It comes in many different colors and makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rafaele Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice water bottle. I am not a big fan of plastic but it is so much lighter weight than glass and so that is why I ordered it. I find it fun to add fruit to the infuser and let it sit overnight in the fridge. It adds some pizazz to the water and since I need to drink so much water with chemotherapy pizazz is a good thing. I ordered the pink one, I like the finger loop that I can carry it with. It is pretty convenient and I have not noticed any leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kyminkentucky

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! It is easy to hold and I has really increased my water consumption. I live experimenting with all different fruit. My only issue is it is a little tough to take the fruit container piece out of the bottle. That takes some practice. But overall it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Chyna Lugnut

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I never drink enough water, so I decided to buy an infusion bottle to use daily. Luckily, I chose this one! I have been using it daily for a week now and I love it! Perfect size, easy to clean, and I've been drinking at least 64 oz. of water a day since beginning to use it. I love the different flavors you can put together in it. It gives a nice flavor essence to your water. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an infusion bottle.
customer_reviews.author: C Swan

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite water bottle. I dropped my other one that I had for two years and broke the lid. I ordered a new one and it's just as good. I love this water bottle and use it every day. I cannot attest to the infusion as I remove that part and just use it for straight water.
customer_reviews.author: Buyeverythinggirl

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great product if a drop of 2ft didnt break it... dropped within a week of owning it and broke it.. dropped off the couch! POOR QUALITY.. after bringing it to the seller's attention, instead of replacing(before 7days use) told me to buy replacement parts.. dont want to support a company that doesnt look out for its customers.. sorry wont be buying from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cup. A few of my friends had them and have been putting grapefruit and ginger in them may help immune system. I thought what a great idea or for anything else you might put in. Easy to drink from no leaking and easy to clean. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kamrath

customer_reviews.title: Don't last more than a year but still a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These were great to use but don't last long. Bought in April and it's December. One broke pretty easy about a week ago. The other is half broke. They do cut down on plastic bottles if I didn't use it. The color fades pretty quick. But I like the ease of the grip so I'll be ordering 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: ajblm

customer_reviews.title: Great product- AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this . She always adds lemon and strawberry to her water anyway - so she loves it. I LOVED LOVED the customer service, they emailed me to let me know it woul be a little longer for the infuser to arrive- however it came fast enough for me, they made to e-mail again to make sure I was happy with it ETC....Great product-great price- AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: Ranie Coley

customer_reviews.title: "Just Love It!"
customer_reviews.text: My new year resolution was to drink more water for hydration to improve my overall health. However, I was having difficulty getting plain water down. So I began my search on Amazon for an infuser water bottle. I read all the reviews and decided on the "Live Infinitely 32 oz. Infuser Water Bottle. I now take it to work every day and enjoy great tasting water with a hint of my fruits all day long. It is just the right size, easy to use, no leaking and the water taste great! I would recommend this product without reservation to anyone looking for an infuser water bottle. "Love It!"
customer_reviews.author: DarDar

customer_reviews.title: Ordered wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I seem to have ordered the wrong color so it is in its box in my counter. I'm a guy so this mauve color isn't something I can walk around with. Im not sure I want to pay shipping to send this back and then order the black one. I have a friend who has this and she loves it which is why I ordered one. What to do...
customer_reviews.author: Sacred

customer_reviews.title: Love The Design
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. The make of the top with the button action and the hook to keep it close. Plus the fruit and veggie infuser part of the bottle. 32z a nice amount. I like the easy grip. I brought the orange and it rocks. I love strawberry and lemon infused together Everyone at my job wants one also. Thank you and it's fun with favor.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Exciting gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my spouse. She was quite excited to receive it. She generally mixes ginger and lemon in a pitcher, but first she boils the ginger. Her concern was that, she was losing properties of the ginger by doing so. This bottle will allow her to put the ginger right in without boiling it first and it saves my pitchers from smelling like soap/ginger.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleLove13

customer_reviews.title: I love this Infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this Infuser bottle; however, I am only giving it 3 stars because there appears to be mold trying to grow on the flexible plastic ring around the infuser part. I have placed it in boiling water & have soaked it in 3 parts water/1 part vinegar & it has not all come off. If someone can solve this, I would give it 10 stars if I could! I love it, but am a little bit leery about the black "mold"!
customer_reviews.author: GrammyC

customer_reviews.title: This is my first purchase I did purchase another
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. So did my husband he took mine! I had to order another to replace it. Love the bottle. I have Stage3C ovarian cancer and am getting ready for my second round of chemo. This siz should last through my infusions. Love the teal as it is the color of the ovarian cancer ribbon! Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Live to Read

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of the prime sale. It's a nice bottle with the added feature of an infuser tube. I dislike that there is no straining piece between the fruit and the drinking top. The cover is also heavy and causes the bottle to tip when it's open and there's not quite a bit of liquid inside. Overall a nice option, but I would make a couple changes to consider it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shannyn

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I do love this water bottle. It’s easy to hold and I love the size. There’s a small delay in the opening of the lid after I push the bottle and I’m a little concerned that the rubber band thing that holds the lid back will break eventually but so far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: I love this infuser bottle. Drinking water got easier! I am aware that I need to drink water at least 8 glasses a day but just plain water is hard for me to meet that goal. But with this infuser bottle, water tastes great and good for my health. I am happy with the design, 100% leak proof, auto align, easy to handle. Planning to get another one for hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne  Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle for infused water
customer_reviews.text: Are use it every day, and make infused water. I am very happy with it. My only complaint is it’s a little hard for me to get the center part out, as the top is a little hard for me to pull. But that’s just me. Otherwise I am extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle I bought...after my daughter claimed mine...the infuser is a great size and works well. The only issue is that sometimes I have a little difficulty getting the infuser to screw onto the cap. Even so, this bottle fits in my car cup holders and delivers flavorful water, it is worth the minor difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Nythngbtjenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Live Infinitely bottles. I usually drink Iced Tea from it because I drink a variety of herbal tea throughout the day. What I love the most is that it's easy to blend what little sugar I allow myself and it doesn't leak. I can throw it in my purse when I'm on the go and not have to worry. The bottles are sturdy, well-made, and just the right size. I also love the handles which make it easier to grasp, as I am a Disabled Veteran and have nerve damage in my hands and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Peek

customer_reviews.title: Love my new infuser
customer_reviews.text: Love my new infuser! It will hold about two bottles of water (I don't care for tap water). I have made several combinations and have liked all of them. One of the best features- it's easy to clean. Only suggestion I have to those experimenting with new juices is- don't use small dried herbs (did a strawberry with dried mint leaves) and the hole where the liquid is a bit large (smaller than a dime), and you'll get a mouthful of the herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Pamster19

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I am continually trying to drink more water and this infusing water bottle makes it easier and more enjoyable. I love the infuser so that I can add my favorite fruits to flavor the water and I especially like that it's clear/see through so that I can see how much I'm drinking. It's a great motivator to keep me drinking water all day. I like the size and pop top opening. I look forward to using it each day and trying different infusing combinations. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: great game stell needs some work

customer_reviews.title: Great Water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle! So easy to fill with fruit, and I don't seem to get any seeds when I drink which I find amazing because the top isn't really mesh or anything that seems like it would keep seeds out. I got my daughter a bottle because she desperately wanted one after seeing mine and she loves it. Colors are very nice. Then someone at work saw it and wanted to get it for his wife.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie03

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cup!
customer_reviews.text: Carol had a smaller version of the cup and thinks the new one will be terrific. Her first outing she used limes from our yard and thought it was TOO STRONG! This is a great review from her. I love the latch at the top.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The store bought fruit infused water is so expensive and in such small bottles that this is a dream come true for me. I put frozen fruit in and it keeps the water colder and then I eat the fruit after, just love it. I don't mind drinking water to begin with but this makes me drink more. thank you. got another one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: daisy duke

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love that it holds more water than other bottles and plenty of room for fruit....very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Occ leaking
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color of the bottle, the ease of cleaning it and drinking out of it, and the purpose of it. Only problem is leaking- this happens when the top is not lined up good or/and if it is not REALLY tightly screwed on. Otherwise bottle is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kat☀️

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle so much, this is the second one I have bought. I love that it is durable and so easy to infuse and clean. Definitely has made the crazy amount of water I'm supposed to be drinking during my pregnancy bearable. I will be a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drink from and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My old water bottle that was similar to this was worn out so I looked for one to replace and came across this one. I liked the way it looked so I ordered it. Upon use I found it to be very efficient in terms of the capacity of water it can hold and how much fruit the infuser can hold. I use this for work since I am always on the go. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sid M

customer_reviews.title: All Wet
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. I could not stop it from leaking and the lid was not that easy to screw on. I was going to send it back but put it back in the box and set it aside and forgot about it. If all of the bottles they sell are like this one, I definitely would not recommend getting one unless you want to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bonk

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but definitely not what I thought it’ll be
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not happy with this cup, I was going to return it but threw the box out too soon. The color is cute and was comfortable to hold. The infuser part is tiny so I didn’t taste the fruit & leaves I added. Doesn’t stay cold very long. Ugh I just ended up going back to my other cup that stay cold and hot for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannivee Hughes

customer_reviews.title: No leaking, good size and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these in different colors. They work great . Have an infuser tube for fruits or my favorite, cucumber, mint and lemon. I don’t like plain water. My grandchildren are drinking more water now as well.
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water bottle. Only draw back is that the inside filter for fruit is a little hard to clean. To get around that I went to the local dollar store and purchased a baby bottle cleaning brush. That works great!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great water bottle for about 5 months until the cap ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great water bottle for about 5 months until the cap began falling apart. The latch no longer closes, the metal ring has fallen off, and the rubber parts have worn out and fallen off. It is now an over-sized plastic cup with no functional use as a water bottle. As recommended, I only hand washed the bottle and have never placed it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I finally like drinking water!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very thankful for this water bottle!! I understand that water is very important for the human body for many reasons, however, I just couldn't get passed an 8 oz glass of water a day, that was a lot for me lol. I resorted to flavored seltzer water. I received my Infuser bottle and have had two to three bottles which are 32oz per bottle a day!! I enjoy mixing up the fruits to get different flavors in the water. The bottle is easy to clean, carry and fill. Thank you again for the infuser, it has saved my skin, hair, nails, and body!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyne Tirado

customer_reviews.title: Staining/plastic not cleaning, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this water bottle and the infuser rod worked really well, but I’ve only used it a handful of times and the plastic has become discolored as shown in the photo. It makes me a little hesitant to use it since I’ve tried washing it multiple times now and it hasn’t come out. It’s too bad because I really liked it the times I used it!
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Rider

customer_reviews.title: Product description incorrect re:dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Product description says “completely dishwasher safe”. Instructions in package say “low temperature”. Low temp does not equal “completely”. It specifically means it cannot be in the dishwasher sanitize cycle. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Desert brat

customer_reviews.title: The button that releases the lid broke free of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The button that releases the lid broke free of the cover and I have no idea how to reattach the action button to the lid. So, I basically have another item to put into the recycling pail. Save your money; buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Teri from NY

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this product. Love the light blue colour. Works well, flip top opens as it should, easy to clean. I drink a lot of water, & this size 32 oz is perfect for me. Good grip. Highly recommend this attractive container.
customer_reviews.author: Kelela

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It’s so easy to clean because there’s no straw to deal with. I love the opening where you drink, it’s the perfect size, perfect amount of water flow. I love the option of including fruit in the diffuser or going without. I love to fill the diffuser with fruit and leave in fridge overnight. Then I’m all set for the day! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 year old son. He had medical issues and was ordered to increase his fluid intake. I thought this was perfect. When u received it the quality was great durable. When I filled the fruit section, there was a lot if pulp that came through. My son has texture issues and could not drink the water with the fruit pieces in it. The bottle was well crafted but the spout to drink from was huge and again my son couldn't drink from it. With that said it is a week made product depending on the buyers needs.
customer_reviews.author: peppers

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this water bottle! There is plenty of room for fruit. I put an entire lemon in my infuser and could probably fit one other half if not a whole other lemon as well. You can lock the cap so it won't open if the button is accidentally pushed which I love for being on the go and needing to stick it in my bag. I am very pleased with the make of the bottle as well. It does not feel cheap or as if it will break after a few uses and washes. I will definitely be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. The first one was perfectly fine but after a year, I wanted to try a different color. I leave it on my desk at work and have had so many people ask about it that they are also purchasing it. I fill it with fresh mint, ginger, cucumber and lemon. It forces me to drink water. It is very functional, attractive ( I got a pink one this time) and leak proof. Great value for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Kabaker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fruit infuser!
customer_reviews.text: These infusers are excellent quality and easy to take apart to clean. I have both regular and freezer ball, and they both work excellent. It is unnecessary to use the freezer ball or infuser rod if u choose not to, water bottle still works excellent. Easy to refill and use. Don't forget to flip the little metal ring while trying to open the lid. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Charlyn Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Has enough space to add a good bit of fruit to infuse with and stays cold for a good while. Only reason I put 4 stars was due to the delivery. I checked my emails this morning and found one saying my order had been delivered yesterday and handed directly to resident. That did not happen. Looked on my front porch and it was sitting out front. Had been there overnight in the rain. Package was soaked through.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy drinking water more
customer_reviews.text: I've been one to usually not drink a whole lot of water, I've tried an infusing bottle before but it was okay. I decided to go with this as it was a lightning deal and I'm so happy with this water bottle. It's a great size, so easy as I have a larger tube to add more fruit to infuse, has a comfort grip and nice clip with it. It's so nice to drink out of too.
customer_reviews.author: Cass W

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: This is a clumsy design. Hard to drink out of and in to get the insert out, I have to go to the garage and get a pair of pliers In order to unscrew the insert top. Most importantly, after two uses, the button that pops the lid open so you can drink out of it broke and it won’t open now. It is in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: A simple design that works like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I used this diffuser water bottle for lemon balm leaf and spearmint tea water. I have used frozen berries in the diffuser to get nutrients as well as keeping the water cool. I've used fresh lemon and mint combos. It works great, is easy to clean, and sits in most cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: MelrM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and Big! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my bottle literally a few hours ago and already tried using it! So far I Totally love it! I got the 32oz in orange and it’s super cute and super big! I can’t wait to take it to the gym and use it for literally everything!
customer_reviews.author: KKardash

product_meta.title: Live Infinitely 32 oz. Infuser Water Bottles - Featuring a Full Length Infusion Rod, Flip Top Lid, Dual Hand Grips & Recipe Ebook Gift (Rose Gold, 32 oz)
feature_bullets: FREE RECIPES INCLUDED –Enjoy our free infused water recipe eBook with 20 delicious & refreshing ideas
RESPONSIBLE- Our Fruit Infusers saved over 128 MILLION bottles from landfills last year alone!
BOOSTED WATER INTAKE- Industry first full length infuser ensures every drop is deliciously fruity
DISHWASHER SAFE - 32oz Shatterproof & BPA-Free bottle - 100% Eastman Tritan safe for all users
1 YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTY- No gimmick, no hassle warranty. We’re not satisfied until you are!
